subject: Testing Multithreaded Code
msgSnippet: What s the recommended way to make sure a test fail/errors if a thread spawned in the code under test throws and exception?  Perhaps something similar to the
messageBody:
What's the recommended way to make sure a test fail/errors if a thread
spawned in the code under test throws and exception? Perhaps
something similar to the threadedTesting.jar, but more current? (That
was posted in Nov 2001, and would need work to compile with a current
jdk.)

TIA,
Lance
